HEBREW: וְעִבְרִ֗ים עָֽבְרוּ֙ אֶת־הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן אֶ֥רֶץ גָּ֖ד וְגִלְעָ֑ד וְשָׁאוּל֙ עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ בַגִּלְגָּ֔ל וְכָל־הָעָ֖ם חָרְד֥וּ אַחֲרָֽיו׃
ENGLISH: And some of the Hebrews went over the Yarden to the land of Gad and Gil῾ad. As for Sha᾽ul, he was still in Gilgal, and all the people followed him trembling.
